column1: Uchi////Uchi is an experience. I have come during happy hour before and it is quite reasonable. I normal hate brussel sprouts
column2: but I cannot get enough at Uchi-- they are fantastic and so full of flavor! The chicken karrage is crispy
column4: and salty and a must for me as well. All the sushi pieces and fish have been superb. Their desserts are visually beautiful and taste great. Because it can normally be quite expensive
column5: it is more of a special occasion sort of place
column6: but I have always been pleased with the service and food here.
